name: Kong (Sputnik World)
overview: According to CommodorePlus, Kong by Sputnik World isn't an exact clone of the Panorama Game & Watch 1983 game, but it is a personal version which has been enriched to make it more enjoyable and far more vibrant. As in brief from the author, not only are the decorations somewhat more widespread than in the original and slightly more enriched in their setting, but higher detailed characters, a new technique used with the Kong Jr. graphic / image on the game's splash screen as well as a collaboration with Narcisound , who has done a fantastic job in the musical section.
